Package game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
game.Game
public class Game extends Object
The main Game class where the game is initialized and played.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game()

  • Method Details

    • init

      private void init()
      Initializes the game, its components, and its files. To be used only in the constructor.

    • run

      private void run()
      Runs the game in a main loop that is timed to update and render every frame of time. If debug is on, the FPS will be printed to the console. Only to be used in the constructor after init() has been called.

    • update

      private void update()
      Updates the Game's components and, if it exists, the current scene.

    • render

      private void render()
      Creates a Renderer and, if it exists, renders the current scene.

    • setCurrentScene

      public void setCurrentScene​(Scene scene)
      Sets the current scene, calls its onStart method, and calls the previous scene's onStop method.
      Parameters:
      scene - The new scene to be set to.

    • getWidth

      public int getWidth()

    • getHeight

      public int getHeight()

    • setScale

      public void setScale​(int newScale)
      Sets the scale but also sets the display's scale automatically.
